system.note: Smoke Cloud created by grenade causes all who start their turn in it to automatically suffer 2d10 Impact Damage with Corrosive and Toxic(3) Qualities.

description.value:
Special: Blast (3), Corrosive, Smoke (6), Toxic (3)

Note: Smoke Cloud created by grenade causes all who start their turn in it to automatically suffer 2d10 Impact Damage with Corrosive and Toxic(3) Qualities.
